title: Stop Payment on a Lost Claim Check
description: A beneficiary reports that they lost their life insurance claim check and needs a new one.

tasks.description: Identify the beneficiary and the claim payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the claim and the specific payment details.

tasks.description: Check if the original check has been cashed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the check has not yet been cashed.

tasks.description: Place a stop payment on the lost check and reissue a new one.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully stops the old check and issues a new payment.
